meanings.definition: A period of one hundred years.
meanings.sent1: The town had a museum exhibit showcasing the history of the past centenaries.
meanings.sent2: The centenaries since the town's founding were filled with stories of growth and change.
meanings.sent3: The idea of celebrating a centenaries-themed birthday party seemed amusing to the young children.
meanings.sent4: The ancient tree in the park stood as a witness to countless centenaries passing by.
meanings.sent5: The centenaries of the old clock tower were marked by the chime of its bells echoing through the town.

meanings.definition: A celebration or event marking the passage of one hundred years.
meanings.sent1: The whole town gathered for the centenaries of the school, enjoying music and food together.
meanings.sent2: The centenaries of the library were always marked with a grand ceremony and speeches.
meanings.sent3: The idea of throwing a surprise party for the centenaries of the town hall amused the mayor.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks display for the centenaries of the city was a dazzling spectacle in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The centenaries of the historic battle were commemorated with a solemn ceremony at the memorial site.
